CustomField.description: For Tabs Follow-Up Report (ADR and CML). Note: (MOD(FLOOR( (Follow_Up_Date__c - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 = MOD(FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1) means "Follow up date is this week".
CustomField.formula:
( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "SMB") && ( (MOD(FLOOR( (Follow_Up_Date__c - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 = MOD(FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1) || ( ( (MOD(FLOOR( (DATEVALUE(ADR_Demo_Date__c) - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 = MOD(FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1) || (MOD(FLOOR( (DATEVALUE(Scheduled_Demo_Date__c) - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 = MOD(FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1) ) && Account.Status__c = "Demo Scheduled" ) ||
( Account.Status__c = "New" || Account.Status__c = "Assigned" || Account.Status__c = "Attempting" || Account.Status__c = "Demo Scheduled" ) ) ) || ( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "ADR") && (MOD(FLOOR( (Follow_Up_Date__c - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1 = MOD(FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE("2006-01-01" ))/7),52)+1) && ( Account.Status__c = "New" || Account.Status__c = "Assigned" || Account.Status__c = "Attempting" || Account.Status__c = "Demo Scheduled" || Account.Status__c = "Contact Established" ) )
CustomField.label: ADR/CML Tabs: Follow-Up
